code: import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import Context from'./../context';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var PizzaProducts=function PizzaProducts(){var PizzaProducts=require('./../json/products.json');var productArr=Object.values(PizzaProducts.pizzas);var _useContext=useContext(Context),cart=_useContext.cart,setCart=_useContext.setCart;var toCart=function toCart(event){var li=event.target.closest('li');var cartArr={};if(cart.length>0){cartArr=JSON.parse(cart);}if(!cartArr.pizzas)cartArr.pizzas=[];cartArr.pizzas.push(li.dataset.id);var cartStr=JSON.stringify(cartArr);localStorage.setItem('cart',cartStr);setCart(cartStr);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"pizzas-goods",children:productArr.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"product","data-id":index,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.img})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"size-weight",children:item.size}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"description",children:item.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cost",children:item.cost}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-btn",onClick:toCart,"data-id":item.id,children:"\u0412 \u043A\u043E\u0440\u0437\u0438\u043D\u0443"})]})]},index);})});};export default PizzaProducts;
